newsitem.title: GERMANY: Germany's Gardena plans September stock listing.
newsitem.headline: Germany's Gardena plans September stock listing.

text.p: German garden equipment maker Gardena Holding AG said on Wednesday it planned to list new preferred stock with total nominal value of 5.7 million marks on the bourse by the end of this month.
The price for the five-mark par value shares would be set in a bookbuilding period expected to run from September 18 through 23, Gardena said.
Lead manager Dresdner Bank AG would set an offer price range on September 17.
Gardena said the offer followed a capital increase of seven million marks which brought its total equity capital to 57 million marks.
